comment._content: Salvage and body searches continued for days afterwards - see this particularly grisly report from the SMH of 14/11/1927 p.11 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16418501

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Horrific and tragic story of the poor schoolgirl Betty Sharp. Thank you for the link beachcomber.
